00031         typedef struct _OMax_learn 
00032         {
00033                 t_object        ob;                     
00034                 t_symbol*       oname;

00036                 int                     nbcoeffs;

00039                 bool            obound;

00041                 int                     maxnotes;

00072         // Functions //
00074         
00075         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00076         {       
00077                 t_class *c;
00078                 
00079                 c = class_new("OMax.learn", (method)OMax_learn_new, (method)OMax_learn_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_learn), 
00080                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00081                 
00082                 // assistance
00083                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_learn_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00084                 
00085                 // input methods
00086                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_learn_add, "add", A_GIMME, 0);
00087                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_learn_note, "note", A_GIMME, 0);
00088                 
00089                 // attributes
00090                 CLASS_ATTR_CHAR(c, "modulo", 0, t_OMax_learn, a_modulo);
00091                 CLASS_ATTR_STYLE_LABEL(c, "modulo", 0, "onoff", "Modulo 12");
00092                 CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c, "modulo", 0);
00093                 CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,"modulo",NULL,(method)OMax_learn_set_modulo);
00094                 
00095                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00096                 OMax_learn_class = c;
00097                 
00098                 return 0;
00099         }
00100

00103         
00106         void *OMax_learn_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00107         {
00108                 t_OMax_learn *x = NULL;
00109                 
00110                 if ((x = (t_OMax_learn *)object_alloc(OMax_learn_class)))
00111                 {
00112                         // inlets & outlets
00113                         x->stateout = intout(x);
00114                         
00116                         x->obound = FALSE;
00117                         if (argc == 0)
00118                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing name of the Oracle to build");
00119                         else
00120                         {
00121                                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00122                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00123                                 else
00124                                 {
00125                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00126                                         x->dataname = OMax_learn_dataname(x->oname);
00127                                         
00129                                         x->maxnotes = MAX_NOTES;
00130                                         x->notecount = 0;
00131                                         x->notes = (O_MIDI_note*)malloc(x->maxnotes*sizeof(O_MIDI_note));
00132                                         
00134                                         x->a_modulo = 0;
00135                                         modulo = x->a_modulo;
00136                                 }
00137                         }
00138                         
00139                         // process attr args, if any
00140                         attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);
00141                         
00142                         // color
00143                         t_object *box;
00144                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00145                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00146                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00147                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00148                 }
00149                 
00150                 return (x);
00151         }

00156         {
00157                 ;
00158         }
00159         
00162         void OMax_learn_assist(t_OMax_oracle *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00163         {
00164                 switch (io)
00165                 {
00166             case 1: // inlets
00167                                 switch (index)
00168                         {
00169                                 case 0: // leftmost
00170                                         sprintf(s, "add ... to learn, note ... to stack");
00171                                         break;
00172                         }
00173                 break;
00174                         case 2: // outlets
00175                                 switch (index)
00176                         {
00177                                 case 0: // leftmost
00178                                         sprintf(s, "state just added");
00179                                         break;
00180                         }
00181                 }
00182         }

00191         t_symbol * OMax_learn_dataname(t_symbol * oname)
00192         {
00193                 char dataname[128];
00194                 strcpy(dataname,oname->s_name);
00196                 strcat(dataname,"_data");
00197                 return gensym(dataname);
00198         }
00199         
00202         bool OMax_learn_bind(t_OMax_learn *x)
00203         {
00205                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00206                 {
00208                         if ((x->oname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->oname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.oracle")))
00209                         {
00210                                 x->builder.set_oracle((((t_OMax_oracle*)(x->oname->s_thing))->oracle));
00211                                 object_post((t_object *)x,"Learner bound to Oracle %s", x->oname->s_name);
00212                         }
00213                         else
00214                         {
00215                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00216                         }
00217                         
00219                         if ((x->dataname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->dataname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.data")))
00220                         {
00221                                 x->builder.set_data((((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->data));
00222                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00223                                 x->datatype = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->datatype;
00224                                 if (x->datatype == SPECTRAL)
00225                                         x->nbcoeffs = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->nbcoeffs;
00226                                 ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->noDelete = FALSE;
00227                                 object_post((t_object *)x,"Learner bound to Data of Oracle %s", x->oname->s_name);
00228                         }
00229                         else
00230                         {
00231                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No data for oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00232                         }
00233                 }
00234                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00235                 return x->obound;
00236         }

00238         /*t_max_err OMax_learn_get_modulo(t_OMax_learn *x, void *attr, long *ac, t_atom **av)
00239         {
00240                 
00241         }*/
00242         
00243         t_max_err OMax_learn_set_modulo(t_OMax_learn *x, void *attr, long ac, t_atom *av)
00244         {
00245                 if (ac&&av)
00246                 {
00247                         x->a_modulo = atom_getlong(av);
00248                         modulo = x->a_modulo;
00249                 }
00250                 else
00251                 {
00252                         x->a_modulo = 0;
00253                         modulo = x->a_modulo;
00254                 }
00255                 return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00256 
00257         }

00263         
00267         void OMax_learn_add(t_OMax_learn *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom * av)
00268         {
00270                 if (OMax_learn_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing)&&(x->dataname->s_thing))
00271                 {
00272                         int out;                                
00273                         if (ac>0)
00274                         {
00276                                 switch (x->datatype)
00277                                 {
00278                                         case LETTERS:
00279                                         {
00280                                                 if (av->a_type == A_SYM)
00281                                                 {
00282                                                         int statenb;
00283                                                         O_char newdata (*atom_getsym(av)->s_name);
00284                                                         statenb = x->builder.get_data()->get_size()-1;
00285                                                         if (statenb>0)
00286                                                                 newdata.set_bufferef(statenb);
00287                                                         else
00288                                                                 newdata.set_bufferef(0);
00289                                                         newdata.set_duration(1);
00290                                                         
00291                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00292                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00293                                                         if (!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount)
00294                                                                 && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount))
00295                                                         {
00297                                                                 out = x->builder.add(newdata);
00298                                                         }
00299                                                         else
00300                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d, %d)",x->oname->s_name, ((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount, ((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount);
00301                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00302                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00303                                                 }
00304                                                 else
00305                                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Wrong type of data");
00306                                                 break;
00307                                                 
00308                                         }
00309                                         case MIDI_MONO:
00310                                         {
00311                                                 O_MIDI_mono * newdata = new O_MIDI_mono();
00312                                                 bool valid = TRUE;
00313                                                 switch(ac)
00314                                                 {
00315                                                         case 6:
00316                                                                 if ((av+5)->a_type == A_LONG)
00317                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_duration(atom_getlong(av+5));
00318                                                                 else
00319                                                                 {
00320                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, duration must be int");
00321                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00322                                                                         break;
00323                                                                 }
00324                                                         case 5:
00325                                                                 if ((av+4)->a_type == A_LONG)
00326                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_bufferef(atom_getlong(av+4));
00327                                                                 else
00328                                                                 {
00329                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, buffer reference must be int");
00330                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00331                                                                         break;
00332                                                                 }
00333                                                         case 4:
00334                                                                 if ((av+3)->a_type == A_LONG)
00335                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_section(atom_getlong(av+3));
00336                                                                 else
00337                                                                 {
00338                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, section must be int");
00339                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00340                                                                         break;
00341                                                                 }
00342                                                         case 3:
00343                                                                 if ((av+2)->a_type == A_LONG)
00344                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_phrase(atom_getlong(av+2));
00345                                                                 else
00346                                                                 {
00347                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, phrase must be int");
00348                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00349                                                                         break;
00350                                                                 }
00351                                                         case 2:
00352                                                                 if ((av+1)->a_type == A_LONG)
00353                                                                         newdata->set_velocity(atom_getlong(av+1));
00354                                                                 else
00355                                                                 {
00356                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, velocity must be int");
00357                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00358                                                                         break;
00359                                                                 }
00360                                                         case 1:
00361                                                                 if (av->a_type == A_LONG)
00362                                                                         newdata->set_pitch(atom_getlong(av));
00363                                                                 else
00364                                                                 {
00365                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, pitch must be int");
00366                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00367                                                                 }
00368                                                                 break;
00369                                                         default:
00370                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, too many arguments");
00371                                                                 valid = FALSE;
00372                                                                 break;
00373                                                 }
00374                                                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00375                                                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00376                                                 if (!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount)
00377                                                         && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount))
00378                                                 {
00379                                                         // Add state to both structures
00380                                                         out = x->builder.add(*newdata);
00381                                                 }
00382                                                 else
00383                                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d, %d)",x->oname->s_name, ((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount, ((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount);
00384                                                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00385                                                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00386                                                 break;
00387                                         }
00388                                         case SPECTRAL:
00389                                         {
00390                                                 int pitchin;
00391                                                 int coeffcount;
00392                                                 bool valid = TRUE;
00393                                                 O_spectral * newdata;
00394                                                 if(ac < (x->nbcoeffs+1)) {
00395                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Missing coefficients");
00396                                                         valid = FALSE;
00397                                                 }
00398                                                 else
00399                                                 {
00400                                                         if ((av)->a_type == A_LONG)
00401                                                                 pitchin = atom_getlong(av);
00402                                                         else
00403                                                                 valid = FALSE;
00404                                                         list<float> coeffsin;
00405                                                         for (coeffcount = 0; coeffcount < x->nbcoeffs; coeffcount++)
00406                                                         {
00407                                                                 if((av+coeffcount+1)->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00408                                                                         coeffsin.push_back(atom_getfloat(av+coeffcount+1));
00409                                                                 else {
00410                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Wrong types in coefficents");
00411                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00412                                                                 }
00413                                                         }
00414                                                         newdata = new O_spectral(pitchin, coeffsin);
00415                                                         if (ac >= x->nbcoeffs+2) {
00416                                                                 if ((av+x->nbcoeffs+1)->a_type == A_LONG)
00417                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_phrase(atom_getlong(av+x->nbcoeffs+1));
00418                                                                 else
00419                                                                 {
00420                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, phrase must be int");
00421                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00422                                                                 }
00423                                                                 if (ac >= x->nbcoeffs+3) {
00424                                                                         if ((av+x->nbcoeffs+2)->a_type == A_LONG)
00425                                                                                 ((O_label*)newdata)->set_section(atom_getlong(av+x->nbcoeffs+2));
00426                                                                         else
00427                                                                         {
00428                                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, section must be int");
00429                                                                                 valid = FALSE;
00430                                                                         }
00431                                                                         if (ac >= x->nbcoeffs+4) {
00432                                                                                 if ((av+x->nbcoeffs+3)->a_type == A_LONG)
00433                                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_bufferef(atom_getlong(av+x->nbcoeffs+3));
00434                                                                                 else
00435                                                                                 {
00436                                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, buffer reference must be int");
00437                                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00438                                                                                 }
00439                                                                                 if (ac == x->nbcoeffs+5) {
00440                                                                                         if ((av+x->nbcoeffs+4)->a_type == A_LONG)
00441                                                                                                 ((O_label*)newdata)->set_duration(atom_getlong(av+x->nbcoeffs+4));
00442                                                                                         else
00443                                                                                         {
00444                                                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, duration must be int");
00445                                                                                                 valid = FALSE;
00446                                                                                         }
00447                                                                                         
00448                                                                                 }
00449                                                                                 else {
00450                                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, too many arguments");
00451                                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00452                                                                                 }
00453                                                                         }}}
00454                                                 }
00455                                                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00456                                                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00457                                                 if (!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount)
00458                                                         && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount))
00459                                                 {
00460                                                         // Add state to both structures
00461                                                         out = x->builder.add(*newdata);
00462                                                 }
00463                                                 else
00464                                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d, %d)",x->oname->s_name, ((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount, ((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount);
00465                                                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00466                                                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00467                                                 break;
00468                                         }
00469                                         case MIDI_POLY:
00470                                         {
00471                                                 bool valid = TRUE;
00472                                                 O_MIDI_poly * newdata = new O_MIDI_poly();
00473                                                 switch (ac)
00474                                                 {
00475                                                         case 6:
00476                                                                 if ((av+5)->a_type == A_LONG)
00477                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_duration(atom_getlong(av+5));
00478                                                                 else
00479                                                                 {
00480                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, duration must be int");
00481                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00482                                                                         break;
00483                                                                 }
00484                                                         case 5:
00485                                                                 if ((av+4)->a_type == A_LONG)
00486                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_bufferef(atom_getlong(av+4));
00487                                                                 else
00488                                                                 {
00489                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, buffer reference must be int");
00490                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00491                                                                         break;
00492                                                                 }
00493                                                         case 4:
00494                                                                 if ((av+3)->a_type == A_LONG)
00495                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_section(atom_getlong(av+3));
00496                                                                 else
00497                                                                 {
00498                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, section must be int");
00499                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00500                                                                         break;
00501                                                                 }
00502                                                         case 3:
00503                                                                 if ((av+2)->a_type == A_LONG)
00504                                                                         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_phrase(atom_getlong(av+2));
00505                                                                 else
00506                                                                 {
00507                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, phrase must be int");
00508                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00509                                                                         break;
00510                                                                 }
00511                                                         case 2:
00512                                                                 if ((av+1)->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00513                                                                         newdata->set_mvelocity(atom_getfloat(av+1));
00514                                                                 else
00515                                                                 {
00516                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, mean velocity must be float");
00517                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00518                                                                         break;
00519                                                                 }
00520                                                         case 1:
00521                                                                 if (av->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00522                                                                         newdata->set_vpitch(atom_getfloat(av));
00523                                                                 else
00524                                                                 {
00525                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, virtual pitch must be float");
00526                                                                         valid = FALSE;
00527                                                                 }
00528                                                                 break;
00529                                                         default:
00530                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, too many arguments");
00531                                                                 valid = FALSE;
00532                                                                 break;
00533                                                 }
00534                                                 if (valid)
00535                                                 {
00536                                                         // Add accumulated notes to the frame
00537                                                         int i;
00538                                                         list<O_MIDI_note> notes;
00539                                                         for (i=0;i<x->notecount;i++)
00540                                                                 notes.push_back(x->notes[i]);
00541                                                         newdata->set_notes(notes);
00542                                                         
00543                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00544                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00545                                                         if (!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount)
00546                                                                 && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount))
00547                                                         {
00548                                                                 // Add state to both structures
00549                                                                 out = x->builder.add(*newdata);
00550                                                         }
00551                                                         else
00552                                                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d, %d)",x->oname->s_name, ((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount, ((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount);
00553                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag);
00554                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00555                                                         
00556                                                         // Clear accumulated notes
00557                                                         x->notecount = 0;
00558                                                         
00559                                                         break;
00560                                                 }
00561                                         }
00562                                 }
00564                                 outlet_int(x->stateout, out);
00565                         }
00566                         else
00567                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Error in input, too few arguments");
00568                 }
00569         }
00570         
00574         void OMax_learn_note(t_OMax_learn *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom * av)
00575         {
00576                 long count = (long)ac;
00577                 t_atom_long vals[5];
00579                 if (OMax_learn_bind(x))
00580                 {
00581                         if (x->datatype!=MIDI_POLY)
00582                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "No note stacking allowed in this type");
00583                         else
00584                         {
00585                                 if (!atom_getlong_array((long)ac, av, count, vals))
00586                                 {
00587                                         switch (count) {
00588                                                 case 2:
00589                                                         x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1]);
00590                                                         x->notecount++;
00591                                                         break;
00592                                                 case 3:
00593                                                         x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2]);
00594                                                         x->notecount++;
00595                                                         break;
00596                                                 case 4:
00597                                                         x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2],vals[3]);
00598                                                         x->notecount++;
00599                                                         break;
00600                                                 case 5:
00601                                                         x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2],vals[3],vals[4]);
00602                                                         x->notecount++;
00603                                                         break;
00604                                                 default:
00605                                                         object_error((t_object*)x, "Wrong number of argument for a note");
00606                                                         break;
00607                                         }
00608                                 }
00609                         }
00610                 }
00611         }
00612         
00614 }
00615 
00616 
00617 #endif
